Digitizing the World's Last Analog Asset: The Road.

RoadHealth AI cuts construction waste by 15% today and builds the autonomous infrastructure maps of tomorrow.

Request Investor Deck

The Market Failure: Flying Blind

Road builders operate on thin 10-20% margins. They lose massive profit to material over-ordering, rework caused by "Reflective Cracking," and cash-flow freezes due to delayed state inspections.

The Opportunity: A $50B global industry running on guesswork. We bring precision.

Our Solution

We replace guesswork with sub-centimeter precision.

Precision Planning

Builders guess volume requirements, leading to waste. We scan surfaces for sub-centimeter volume calculations.

ROI: Immediate reduction in procurement costs.

Real-Time Intervention

Hidden cracks ruin expensive top layers. We catch defects on the base layer before it's too late.

ROI: A $50 fix prevents a $5,000 demolition.

Instant Certification

"Retention Money" is locked up for weeks. We generate automated, compliant quality reports instantly.

ROI: Accelerates cash flow release by 14+ days.

Our Technology

We fuse multiple data streams to build a comprehensive digital twin.

  • Multi-Sensor Fusion: Integrating high-density LiDAR, 4K Video, and RTK-GPS data.
  • AI-Powered Analysis: Proprietary computer vision algorithms detect cracks, potholes, and rutting automatically.

Business Model: "Land & Expand"

Stage 1: Service Bureau

Current

We operate the tech. High margins, instant trust, data accumulation.

Stage 2: Hardware-SaaS

Next 18 Months

Leasing LiDAR/Vision kits to contractors for $500/mo. Recurring revenue.

The Long-Term Vision: Data Monetization

Building the "Digital Twin" of Road Infrastructure.

While we fix roads today, we are aggregating the most detailed road-surface dataset in the region.

  • AV Developers: Training data for suspension control.
  • Logistics: Route optimization based on road health.
  • Insurance: Predictive maintenance models.
